DQ_Rule_Description: Checks for presence of Unallowable Keywords/ Characters
Checks for presence of Null/ Blank values
Checks if Email conforms to standard format
Checks for duplicate data using single or composite columns
Checks for presence of leading and/or trailing characters
Performs value comparison check between two columns
Check for the presence of specified substring in a column
Check if Date is on a Weekend or not
Check if Date is in Future or not
Check if Date is on a weekday or not
Check if Date is in Past or not
Check for presence of specified keywords
Compares the pattern or format against the specified pattern
Checks whether date is valid or not (If the input column value is convertible to valid date then PASS else FAIL)
Checks the Cardinality between two columns
